Are you passionate about business intelligence and eager to gain hands-on experience in a collaborative and innovative environment this summer? Join our team as a Visualization Intern to help shape the future of intelligent analytics by bringing data to life with interactive dashboards and real-world projects that drive smarter business decisions!About the BusinessLexisNexis Risk Solutions is the essential partner in the assessment of risk. Within our Insurance vertical, we provide customers with solutions and decision tools that combine public and industry-specific content with advanced technology and analytics to assist them in evaluating and predicting risk and enhancing operational efficiency. Our insurance risk solutions help drive better data-driven decisions across the insurance policy lifecycle all while reducing risk. You can learn more about LexisNexis Risk at the link below. https://risk.lexisnexis.com/insuranceAbout our Team Join a dynamic Visualization team dedicated to transforming data into actionable insights! As part of our Business Intelligence and Visualization group, we specialize in creating effective, elegant, and efficient Power BI dashboards that empower the business to make informed decisions. Our culture thrives on collaboration, creativity, and continuous learning—every team member plays a vital role in bringing data to life and driving strategic impact.About the Role As a Visualization Intern, you’ll gain hands-on experience working on impactful projects that strengthen your technical and analytical skills. You’ll help design dashboards, compile data dictionaries, enhance reporting catalogs, and support ad hoc data pulls. This role offers the chance to collaborate with cross-functional teams and contribute to solutions that drive business success.Location: On-site in Alpharetta, GA. Relocation assistance is not provided.  Program Dates: May 18 – July 24, 2026 Eligibility: Undergraduate students expected to graduate by May 2027. ResponsibilitiesBuild dashboards using tools such as Power BI, Tableau, and SQL.Compile and maintain data dictionaries.Enhance and organize report catalogs.Assist with ad hoc data pulls and staging.Gather metrics and maintain reporting repositories.Participate in team discussions to improve automation and data quality.RequirementsBe currently pursuing a bachelor’s degree in data analytics, business analytics, computer science, business intelligence, or a related field of study with a graduation date of May 2027. Demonstrate familiarity with visualization tools (Power BI, Tableau) and basic-to-intermediate Microsoft SQL Server skills.Exhibit solid analytical and problem-solving abilities, along with curiosity and eagerness to learn new tools, frameworks, and technologies. Be able to collaborate effectively in a team of developers and data scientists.   Possess effective written and verbal communication skills to document findings and share ideas clearly.  Learn more about the LexisNexis Risk team and how we work here.  Salary $20/hour   #earlycareer 

This position is not eligible for benefits.
